name: Small dagger
description: The very thing you begin your journey with.

name: Big (gender) dagger
description: An upgrade! Not that impressive, but still progress.

name: Big boy bat
description: Despite the name, it can be used by anyone.

name: Big sword
description: Yeah, well...what were you expecting? Slightly stronger than the big gender dagger.

name: Pixel sword
description: Ooh, blocky!

name: Sparkle sword
description: Makes me wanna cry...

name: Mime sword
description: Ceci n'est pas une epee (This is not a sword). (it's invisible, but does a lot of damage anyway.)

name: Ink sword
description: Weird thing from a weird guy!

name: Robot sword
description: I stole this from the kits...don't tell!

name: Garden shears
description: Totally not a reference to one of the most depressing games every made. Can only be used once. It does a lot of damage, but it's still fragile.

name: Cyclops' eye
description: You thought something pretty was going to be a charm? Nah.

name: Book
description: Wikipedia.

name: Big bag of nothing
description: HAHAHAHAHA!!! PRANKED!!! - Little boy

name: Fashion magazine
description: Ceci n'e-wait, this IS an authentic French magazine from Chanel! Smell the perfume samples and relax~

name: Eiffel Tower
description: Merci beaucoup.

name: Fear of falling
description: Ok, I know it's not something pleasant to fit what it is, BUT-*thud*

name: Arachnophobia
description: The feeling of conquering your fears. Literally.

name: Claustrophobia
description: Ok, I know it came from the spider but it's just for dramatic effect. You're in a maze, right? It makes sense.

name: Spider eyes
description: Okay, ew.

name: Apple
description: The staple of restoration.

name: Croissant
description: Cute, but also a fun treat.

name: Baguette
description: Long boy.

name: Crepes
description: Soft and fluffy.

name: Choux
description: The staple of restoration.

name: Macaron
description: I'm sorry most of the food is French, but it has to be for now.
